The Right Stuff, San Francisco1.Performance by Sybil Opthalmia BruncheonCOMMERCIAL:Casio Pocket TV2.Brandon Judell interviews Bill Sherwood, director of "Parting Glances" and shows footage from the filmCOMMERCIAL:Mastertouch3.The Right Stuff, introduction by Phillip R.
